title: STUC General Secretary's speech to SNP Conference (STUC - Scottish Trades Union Congress)
text: ( Source : STUC - Scottish Trades Union Congress ) SNP party conference 17 October 2015 Aberdeen Thank you for inviting me to address your conference this morning. I am deeply grateful for this historic opportunity to contribute during this
